tweets.text: More agricultural muck stored against the rules, literally on top of a watercourse this time. Directly under the muck pile runs a drainage ditch that runs straight into the River Frome, which runs straight into the Lugg, which exceeds phosphate limits. @EnvAgency /1 https://t.co/IhAXZqe2gs
@FloodSkinner @ECMWF HYS behavioural insights for #FloodResilience in @EnvAgency #FCERM action plan, published 12/05/2021 https://t.co/GNsFPOMAG8

Weirs can be essential for capturing data on river levels - for droughts & floods - but can disconnect ecology along stretches of a river. So today let‚Äôs celebrate team 23 who worked on Pymmes Brook in London to ‚Äònotch‚Äô 7 weirs and opened up over 2km of the river #50teams50days https://t.co/zgsDoyw3ie

@EnvAgencyMids So the gas flare will reduce odours will it like all the actions of the enforcement notice , two weeks later it‚Äôs worse than ever . You now see why we don‚Äôt trust you ? Follow the paper trail @EnvAgencyMids and close the wretched place down .

How long has it taken for the @EnvAgency to actively audit waste? Dereliction of duty, negligent. All the while our children are breathing in goodness knows what. We feel like we‚Äôre dying - now we know why @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @MattHancock @StinkStopthe https://t.co/zzxtCefFd8

tweets.text: @EllieChowns @EnvAgency I've reported two of those on our local river within a mile of each other. One has shifted the other is still there nearly 2 years later. Watercourse to the left-hand side of the "bund" @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/TQRmAkrYQg

@BenM_Anderson @davemh72 @SOPH_C_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Pretty sure thats correct but they were not twice as effective 10 years ago either - if they are not directing the funding they do have to issues like this then what are their priorities ?? If lack of enforcement is due to lack of funding then say that so the debate can be had üëç

@Martinpedalman @davemh72 @SOPH_C_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids The EA is underfunded and underpowered. I'm pretty sure they are doing as much as they can, but if you've had your funding cut in half over a decade, it's not that surprising that you aren't as effective. I agree that it's not fit for purpose - I just think that is by design.

Organised crime networks are stealing car parts for their precious metals.

Read more: https://t.co/bmOkpZsYDM

@BTP https://t.co/Cbyioiyc6d

@EnvAgencyMids The stink is now day and night and unbearable. Surely with you FINALLY checking loads it is time for independent core testing of what has gone into that landfill. Why wasn't it being checked? We need to know - you should act for the public, no one else @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink

Look what #teamskillmill found in #Newcastle. A secret garden in one of our parks. Hidden treasures indeed @altweet_pet @NU_Foundation @urbangreenncl @NewcastleCC @EnvAgencyYNE @NorthEastTweets @ChronicleLive https://t.co/GUDOzDgTQf

@EnvAgencyMids Surely this suggests illegal loads have been tipping in there for years. Investigate it, prove it & shut down the operation. RED are not to be trusted with running this landfill! The only solution is to cap this place off! #stopthestink

urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP

@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency Don't forget their other company also headed by crimey Mr Share, Chem Tech Waste Management - take the award for repackaging oven cleaner which a child subsequently drank - clear the floor for environmental horror that is Red https://t.co/sdF9F320kq

Anglers have improved banks & drainage at Great Cheverell lakes nr Devizes, home of Lavington Angling Club
Overgrown vegetation will now be cleared from the 2 lakes returning them to prime condition 
Great work-all part funded by #FisheriesImprovementProgramme

Before & after pix https://t.co/LeWXFR9bE6

Joint patrol this afternoon with @EnvAgency @AnglingTrust @NorPolRural around local lakes checking compliance and reassurance to public. Engagement alongside enforcement. #drone @NorthantsPolice https://t.co/NbFgeYGi2x
